AboutText: An inquisitive, jack-of-all-trades web developer, I transform ideas into interactive experiences using React and Three.js. As a student at the IUT2 in Grenoble, I like to create dynamic interfaces where technique and aesthetics go hand in hand. I love exploring, learning and pushing the limits of the web!
ProjectsText: I invite you to explore my projects in chronological order, highlighting my journey and the evolution of my skills, from developing innovative applications to creating websites.
ContactText: Feel free to contact me for any questions or collaborations.
